== Main Inclusion Report for nvidia-settings ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' <nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/n/nvidia-settings/]]</nowiki>; available for i386 and amd64 architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Recommended but the nvidia-glx-$VER packages
** It's extremely useful to configure NVIDIA's proprietary driver as regards power management, colour correction, multiple screens, etc.
